title: Is Royal Dutch Shell plc’s Bid For BG Group plc In Trouble?
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Aug 26, 2015, 15:23 BST - UK Markets close in 1 hr 7 mins Is Royal Dutch Shell plc’s Bid For BG Group plc In Trouble? By Owain Bennallack | Fool.co.uk – 4 minutes 4 seconds ago 1,605.50 -27.9999 
The commodity sector has been in turmoil in recent months, and that hasn't done anything to change the opinion of those who doubted the logic of Shell 's (LSE: RDSB) £47 billion bid for BG Group (LSE: BG). But what is the share price action telling us? 
A video or other embedded content has been hidden. Click here to view it. 
Elsewhere in the market, the Fool's experts believe sales could treble in just five years at this e-commerce stealth attack whose maverick CEO may have been underestimated by the City. For more free information on this daring buy, click here now . 

Owain Bennallack owns shares in Royal Dutch Shell. The Motley Fool UK has no position in any of the shares mentioned. We Fools don't all hold the same opinions, but we all believe that considering a diverse range of insights makes us better investors.
